alert.note: Alert for Cass (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 7:08PM CDT until June 13 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... Central Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Cass County in northeastern Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 708 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near McLeod, or 9 miles southeast of Atlanta, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Minden, Vivian, Sibley, Plain Dealing, Cotton Valley, Sarepta, Hosston, Dixie Inn, Rodessa, Ida, Gilliam, Ravanna, McLeod, Evergreen, Alden Bridge, Rocky Mount, Bellevue, Gilark, Bolinger and Ivan. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
